title: Machine learning-based prediction of fish acute mortality: implementation, interpretation, and regulatory relevance
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00072B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lilian Gasser, Christoph Schür, Fernando Perez-Cruz, Kristin Schirmer, Marco Baity-Jesi
The study focuses on the implementation and interpretation of four state-of-the-art machine learning methods coupled with six molecular representations to predict fish acute mortality.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
